documentation.text: @dev Reward amount represents by per staking token

@dev How many reward tokens accrued recently
 @return The amount of reward tokens accrued recently

@dev How many stakingToken (XToken) deposited into to this reward pool (staking pool)
 @return The total amount of XTokens deposited in this staking pool

@dev Get the address of token for staking in this staking pool
 @return The staking token address

@dev Get the address of token for rewards in this staking pool
 @return The rewards token address

@dev Stake/Deposit into the reward pool (staking pool)
 @param  amount The target amount

@dev Withdraw from the reward pool (staking pool), get the original tokens back
 @param  amount The target amount
@dev Withdraw without caring about rewards. EMERGENCY ONLY.
@dev Claim the reward the user earned
@dev Add ETH reward to the staking pool
@dev User exit the reward pool, it's actually withdraw and getReward

 @return The rewards token address

accrued().details: How many reward tokens accrued recently

returns._0: The amount of reward tokens accrued recently

addETHReward().details: Add ETH reward to the staking pool

balanceOf(address).details: How many stakingToken (XToken) deposited by the target account

returns._0: The total amount of XToken deposited in this staking pool

earned(address).details: How many reward tokens a user has earned but not claimed at present

returns._0: The amount of reward tokens a user earned

emergencyWithdraw().details: Withdraw without caring about rewards. EMERGENCY ONLY.

exit().details: User exit the reward pool, it's actually withdraw and getReward

getReward().details: Claim the reward the user earned

rewardPerToken().details: Reward amount represents by per staking token

rewardsToken().details: Get the address of token for rewards in this staking pool

stake(uint256).details: Stake/Deposit into the reward pool (staking pool)

stakeForOther(address,uint256).details: Stake/Deposit into the reward pool (staking pool) for other account

stakingToken().details: Get the address of token for staking in this staking pool

totalSupply().details: How many stakingToken (XToken) deposited into to this reward pool (staking pool)

returns._0: The total amount of XTokens deposited in this staking pool

withdraw(uint256).details: Withdraw from the reward pool (staking pool), get the original tokens back
